thread.section_title: Hotel Exquis by Elegancia - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely red hotel
thread.title_full: Lovely red hotel - Review of Hotel Exquis by Elegancia, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: anqqa
title: Lovely red hotel
text: I was sold right from the start - they had free muffins at the reception! Nicely decorated hotel with rooms sized like they usually are in Paris, tiny. Not very near metro stations but still an easy walking distance from multiple lines. Many nice restaurants and cafés nearby (e.g. had the best croissants of our trip at the café from Before Sunset), a supermarket cross the street and sweet boulangerie next door.
